2018.title: MobiledgeX
2018.description: MobiledgeX offers a global edge cloud system across mobile operators to transform, manage, and monetize edge network infrastructure.

2018.title: edgeEngine
2018.description: The mimik edgeEngine provides a light weight container environment to facilitate the development of JavaScript based microservices based on a serverless architecture.

2018.description: Google Edge TPU is Google's purpose-built  Application Specific Integrated Circuit designed to run AI at the edge.

2018.title: StarlingX
2018.description: StarlingX is an open source project that offers the services needed for distributed edge cloud either to choose from or to deploy it as one package.
